chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
I went to the pickup point and there is no package. The store woman says she didn't pick up anything, yet UPS shows it was delivered and it's not true. It was supposed to arrive today and didn't deliver to my house despite waiting all day and nobody knocked or called and now it's also not at the pickup point.
Thank you,

Dear ecomobile 

Nice to meet you, this is Manuel of Back Market. I hope this message finds you well and starting a terrific weekend.

The TN shows that is an investigation in process due to a lost parcel.

Could you confirm the situation, please?

Thank you, and have a nice Saturday.

Sincerely, 
Manuel from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device, 356174413534275, and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD.

Regards,
KJ
